<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105295</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Four Tones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vier Töne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quatre Tonalités</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quatro Tons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quattro Toni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέσσερις τόνοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuatro Tonos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an interactive display that allow exploration of four key tones in Chinese language</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine interaktive Bildschirmanzeige, das
Erforschung von vier Schlüsseltönen in der chinesischen Sprache 
erlauben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un affichage interactif qui permettent 
l'exploration de quatre tonalités principales en langue chinoise</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um indicador interativo que permite uma 
exploração de quatro tons chaves na língua chinesa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una visualizzazione interattiva che 
permette un'esplorazione di quattro toni chiave in linguaggio 
cinese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια διαλογική παρουσίαση που επιτρέπει την
εξερεύνηση τεσσάρων βασικών τόνων στην κινεζική γλώσσα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una visualización interactiva que permite
la exploración de cuatro tonos dominantes en lenguaje chino</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>

    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/four-tones</uri>
